metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5704 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Open On-Chip Debugger (OpenOCD) 0.10.0 does not block attempts to use HTTP POST for sending data to 127.0.0.1 port 4444, which allows remote attackers to conduct cross-protocol scripting attacks, and consequently execute arbitrary commands, via a crafted web site.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openocd - 0.10.0-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openocd package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.0-4').
